title.rendered: How Get Inspired Got 100,000+ Leads Using a Simple SleekBox

content.rendered:
What Do They Use Sleeknote For?

They needed an effective way to capture value from all the visits on the website and increase their email list. They gave Sleeknote a try and it didn’t take long before they realized that they were definitely benefitting from using Sleeknote.

Creative Newsletter Collection

They have done a lot of A/B split testing to find out how the SleekBox should look to get the highest conversion rate. At the moment, they use a weekly SleekBox where they give away a gift card or a product every week to one lucky new subscriber.

On Get Inspired’s website, their SleekBoxes have been viewed +3,900,000 times. Furthermore, they have acquired +150,000 leads, which gives them a conversion rate of 3,8%, which is very satisfying. If that wasn’t enough, their conversion rate improves every week as long as they keep on doing A/B split testing.

“The drag-n-drop function makes it possible to create and customize a SleekBox without any hassle.”
Andreas Nordås Get Inspired

A/B Split Test is a Powerful Feature

Get Inspired especially likes the A/B split test function. In their own words, they test everything – every single word in the SleekBox, images, and colors. They’ve also tested what days work best, and they’ve experienced a huge difference in their conversion rate, depending on what day we pick the winner of our competition.

Also, according to Get Inspired, the drag-n-drop function makes it possible to create and customize a SleekBox without any hassle. You just need a photo and something to write and then you’re almost done.

GET INSPIRED SLEEKBOXES
